## alertVariant

Basic css helper for different colored Alert components.

### Parameters

-   `background` **[string][1]** 
-   `border` **[string][1]** 
-   `bodyColor` **[string][1]** 

Returns **[string][1]** 

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String
